author: TruthGundlach
content: Kusama’s innovations include soft sculpture art  (Oldenburg took it), wallpaper art (Warhol took it), mirror room art (Samaras took it).

author: TruthGundlach
content: Moment of truth for DXY. Closed today right on top of 9 month uptrend and just above 200-day MA.  And gold broke out above it’s huge base.
